title: Thousands of devotees gather to worship Sacred Kapilavasthu Relics at Gangarama temple
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The Sacred Kapilawasthu Relics are now being in exposition around the clock at the Gangarama Temple in Hunipitiya, Colombo.  The public can pay homage to the Sacred Relics from noon today ( Saturday 08) to Tuesday 6.00 pm on September 11.
